ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1018
ygData.msgSnippet: Perhaps its the people you play with =) I find Tarew Marr to be bristling with fun places to go and fun people to go with, and as a bard, I get invited to do
ygData.messageBody:
Perhaps its the people you play with =)

I find Tarew Marr to be bristling with fun places to go and fun people to go
with, and as a bard, I get invited to do everything.

Perhaps a change of groupmates would be good Maev ?

Frashii Allegropaw, 49th Strung Out bard
Warders of Magic

On 22 Jun 2000 eqbards@egroups.com wrote:

> Subject: Re: (OT) jhenders' .sig
>
> Seeya around Phayde :)
> Actually though I sorta quit my bard at 54, but then pushed him to 55
> for the sake of having the mana song, but have since quit altogether.
> Not sure how Tarew Marr stacks up to the other servers, but it doesnt
> seem too lively these days.
> Have fun,
> Maev Lorekeeper
> Tarew Marr
